pairs.subject: Annual Performance Review Process
pairs.desc:
Dear Team,

As we approach the end of the fiscal year, I wanted to remind everyone about the upcoming Annual Performance Review process. This is an important time for all of us to reflect on our achievements and set goals for the upcoming year. 

Please find attached the Performance Review Guide, which outlines the steps you need to follow to complete your self-assessment. Make sure to submit your reviews by the deadline of December 15th. 

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,

HR Team
pairs.explain: The email is from the HR department, contains a legitimate attachment, and discusses a standard company procedure.

pairs.subject: Important: Update Your Performance Review
pairs.desc:
Dear Employee,

We have noticed that you have not yet updated your performance review. It is crucial that you complete this as soon as possible to avoid any issues with your evaluation. 

Attached is the updated Performance Review Guide that you must download and execute to proceed. Please ensure you do this before the deadline.

Thank you,

HR Team
pairs.explain: The email includes an executable attachment which is suspicious and is trying to trick the employee into running malicious software.

pairs.subject: Quarterly Financial Report
pairs.desc:
Hello Team,

Attached you will find the Quarterly Financial Report for Q3. This document provides a comprehensive overview of our financial performance, including revenue, expenses, and profit margins. 

Please review the report carefully and let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification. Your insights are invaluable as we prepare for the upcoming quarterly meeting.

Best,

Finance Department

Failure to do so may result in significant consequences for our department.

pairs.subject: IT System Maintenance Notification
pairs.desc:
Dear All,

We would like to inform you about the scheduled maintenance for our IT systems. This maintenance is necessary to ensure that our systems remain secure and efficient. 

The maintenance will take place on Saturday, November 20th, from 10 PM to 2 AM. During this time, access to certain systems may be limited. 

Please find the maintenance schedule attached for your reference. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,

IT Department
pairs.explain: The email is from the IT department, contains a legitimate PDF attachment, and provides information about scheduled maintenance.

As part of our ongoing efforts to streamline the travel reimbursement process, we have attached the new Travel Expense Reimbursement Form. Please fill it out and submit it along with your receipts for any travel expenses incurred during the last quarter. 

Make sure to submit your forms by the end of the month to ensure timely processing. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out.
